personal.name: Owais Iqbal
personal.title: Associate Software Engineer
personal.bio: I architect intelligent solutions at the intersection of AI and full-stack development. From building accessibility-first applications to automating complex workflows, I transform ideas into impactful digital experiences.
personal.closingBio: Ready to collaborate on something extraordinary? I'm always excited to connect with fellow innovators, explore cutting-edge projects, and push the boundaries of what's possible with technology. Let's build the future together.
story: With over 4 years of experience in full-stack development and more than 2 years of experience in AI/ML Engineering, I've had the privilege of working with vibrant teams across enterprise companies, building everything from MVPs to large-scale applications serving millions of users.

My journey has been defined by creating meaningful impact through technology. From research publications to innovation competitions, I've consistently focused on building solutions that genuinely improve people's lives. Whether working on accessibility, security, or wellness applications, I'm driven by the belief that technology should be both powerful and purposeful.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, or maybe gaming. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Dual-focused role enhancing reusable MicroFrontend (MFE) applications delivering scalable updates via CDN while spearheading AI-driven automation initiatives. Collaborated across teams for seamless e-commerce integration from PLP to checkout, serving millions of users, and led cutting-edge AI solutions for vulnerability resolution, code generation, and team productivity enhancement.
achievements: Enhanced MicroFrontend architecture delivering rapid, scalable updates to millions of users
Championed AI-driven automation for vulnerability resolution and intelligent code generation
Developed internal automation tools boosting team efficiency using Python, FastAPI, and AI SDKs
Led cross-team collaboration for seamless e-commerce integration from PLP to checkout
Implemented AI solutions using Langchain, Google ADK, OpenAI, and HuggingFace technologies

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Deployed pods and services in Kubernetes clusters with L7 load balancing. Developed prototypes showcasing SingleStore as vector store utilizing RAG with Langchain.
achievements: Designed Logic apps for application secrets expiry notification
Managed cloud infrastructure and container orchestration

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Developed innovative Faceless Recruitment System featuring bias-free hiring through anonymous candidate evaluation. Built full-stack application with secure authentication and automated screening workflows. Led intern team through complete development cycle and pitched solution to HR leadership.
achievements: Built complete recruitment platform with Azure MySQL Database and Nodejs Backend
Deployed application using Heroku and Docker
Led cross-functional team of interns to project success

projects.title: Foresight
projects.subtitle: AI Accessibility Accelerator
projects.description: Open-source accessibility accelerator for visually impaired individuals utilizing ShareGPT4V, Detectron2, and Gemma 7B models. Improved visual comprehension by 11% over base model with voice-controlled navigation.
projects.longDescription: Research project under Unisys & Ramaiah Institute of Technology focusing on multimodal generative AI for accessibility. Combines LLAVA-1.5, Gemma 7B, and Detectron2 for reduced hallucinations and enhanced object recognition.

projects.title: PasswordlessAuth
projects.subtitle: Identity Provider SDK
projects.description: Identity Provider SDK enabling passwordless authentication through facial verification, voice recognition, NFC, ECG, QR codes, and FIDO authentication. Combines 5 authentication methods with SSO.
projects.longDescription: Research project providing comprehensive passwordless authentication solutions for web and mobile applications. Implements Facenet for facial verification, Resemblyzer for voice recognition, and WebAuthn API for FIDO authentication.

projects.title: Memoirs
projects.subtitle: Mental Health Platform
projects.description: Mental health surveillance and assessment platform for teens and students. Features personalized music recommendations with Solfeggio frequencies and AI-powered mental health assistance.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive mental health platform analyzing journal entries to provide personalized support. Integrates specific brain-targeting frequencies and AI-driven goal generation for depression support.

projects.title: StudentBuzz
projects.subtitle: Student Collaboration Platform
projects.description: A collaborative platform that empowers students to showcase their skills, projects, and accomplishments while fostering a vibrant community of learning and collaboration.
projects.longDescription: Full-stack platform enabling students to create comprehensive profiles highlighting skills and achievements, join clubs, collaborate across colleges, and share educational resources. Features inter-college collaboration, club activities, and notification systems.

projects.title: Promonade
projects.subtitle: Promotions Management UI
projects.description: Full-stack application for Promonade promotions management system built with modern React and Spring boot technologies and beautiful UI components.
projects.longDescription: Modern React frontend for promotions management featuring responsive design with Tailwind CSS, interactive charts with Recharts, and comprehensive UI components using Shadcn. Integrates with backend promotions management system.

projects.title: Car Theft Detection System
projects.subtitle: Automated Parking Security
projects.description: Automated vehicle theft detection system for parking facilities using computer vision and barcode scanning technology.
projects.longDescription: Python-based security system that detects vehicle theft in real-time using moving object detection, Frame differencing techniques and barcode scanning for parking entry validation. Notifies security personnel about unauthorized vehicle movements with automated monitoring.

projects.title: Bubble Bop
projects.subtitle: QR-Based Restaurant Management
projects.description: Hotel management system that takes orders for each table based on scanning QR codes available at tables, streamlining the dining experience.
projects.longDescription: Django-based restaurant management system featuring QR code table ordering, MongoDB integration, email notifications, and comprehensive order management. Includes both customer-facing ordering interface and restaurant management dashboard.

projects.title: Myxable
projects.subtitle: File Conversion Platform
projects.description: Open-source multiformat bulk file conversion platform that won 2nd place at Reva Hack 2021 hackathon.
projects.longDescription: Django-based file conversion platform supporting multiple file formats with bulk processing capabilities. Features user-friendly interface for seamless file format conversions, developed as part of hackathon competition.

projects.title: Valunique
projects.subtitle: Faceless Recruitment System
projects.description: Innovative recruitment platform eliminating bias through faceless hiring processes, developed during Volvo Group internship.
projects.longDescription: Node.js-based recruitment system designed to reduce hiring bias by focusing on skills and qualifications rather than personal attributes. Features comprehensive candidate evaluation, MySQL database integration, and EJS templating for dynamic content rendering.

publications.description: Experiment on using AI to create a web portfolio

seo.title: Owais Iqbal - AI/ML Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
seo.description: Associate Software Engineer at Lowe's specializing in AI-driven automation, MicroFrontend architecture, and accessibility technology. Expert in Python, React.js, and cloud technologies.
